TopicTitle: The ability to share ships between saves

Articles.Content: It would be great if I could select ships based on the save file they were created in, or even make different folders for ships

Do you mean ships that have already been launched or just the design built in the editor?  On non-console, In KSP1 you can copy .craft files from the ..saves/.../Ships/... directory from one save to another.  But of course you need the same parts available so you'd still need to unlock the right parts in career mode or install the mods involved.  I don't know about console.  But yeah, KSP2 would do us a favor to have a way to do on all platforms
